info.name: Gmail Non-Transparent (Light)
info.description:
This is a Gmail script that makes the main background of the email/contact section non transparent light color.
This might help in clarity/readability of the page. Works with the new Google themes.

If you like it please leave a positive comment.
info.additionalInfo:
2012/04/23 v1.0 First Release
2013/02/21 v1.1 Updated code to change color of the calendar tab to be background color (white).
